LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Generic_0: It's good to be the governor.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Generic_2: It is a blessing to wake up to the smell of taxes.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Generic_3: What a nice day to spend in my settlement.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Bloodlust_0: KNIFE GOES IN, GUTS COME OUT!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Bloodlust_2: I'm going to crucify whoever dirtied my carpet!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Bloodlust_4: Our foes will suffer exquisite cruelties.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Kind_0: Hello, friends! Let us greet the day together!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Kind_2: Greetings, my beloved underlings! May your day be blessed!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Kind_3: I love being the governor, and taking care of my people.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Kind_4: Love conquers all, just like our Empire!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Transhumanist_0: My governance is a well-oiled machine. Efficiency is key.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_BodyPurist_0: how did this get here i am not good with computer
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Psychopath_0: No tables! No more tables, for anybody!
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Psychopath_3: We should give our children rifles. They can shoot back, and they are mobile cover for the adults.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Psychopath_5: Oh, how I wish that I had nuclear weapons.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Psychopath_6: Cats are a good, sustainable source of chemfuel. They grow quicker than human children.
LanguageData.Empire_Bark_Psychopath_7: I like my wine like I like my enemies. Buried in the backyard without anybody knowing.
